        public java.util.Optional<java.util.List<Phone>> findAllPhonesByUser(java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                                     java.lang.Integer pageNum,
                                                                     java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                                     org.springframework.data.domain.Sort.Direction order,
                                                                     java.lang.Long userId)
                                                              throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
        Parameters:
        pageSize - Amount of Tasks to be returned at once. Min = 1
        pageNum - Zero based index.
        orderBy - Property name to order by.
        order - Ascending or Descending Sort.Direction
        Returns:
        'Optional.of(List)' or Optional.empty() if nothing found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 1) If pageSize or pageNum are greater or less than their Min and Max values or < 0. 2) If 'orderBy' is null or empty 3) If 'order' is null
        InternalServerErrorException - IllegalStateException - if called for a Java Persistence query language UPDATE or DELETE statement QueryTimeoutException - if the query execution exceeds the query timeout value set and only the statement is rolled back TransactionRequiredException - if a lock mode other than NONE has been set and there is no transaction or the persistence context has not been joined to the transaction PessimisticLockException - if pessimistic locking fails and the transaction is rolled back LockTimeoutException - if pessimistic locking fails and only the statement is rolled back PersistenceException - if the query execution exceeds the query timeout value set and the transaction is rolled back
        javax.persistence.PersistenceException

                                                                  throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
        Parameters:
        pageSize - Amount of Employees at once
        pageNum - Zero-based pagination.
        orderBy - Non-null and non-empty property name the Employees to be ordered by
        order - Ascending or Descending
        employeeId - Id of the Position
        Returns:
        Optional.of(List Classifiers) or Optional.empty() if nothing found.
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If some DateBase problems occurred (Locks, timeouts etc). IllegalStateException - if called for a Java Persistence query language UPDATE or DELETE statement QueryTimeoutException - if the query execution exceeds the query timeout value set and only the statement is rolled back TransactionRequiredException - if a lock mode other than NONE has been set and there is no transaction or the persistence context has not been joined to the transaction PessimisticLockException - if pessimistic locking fails and the transaction is rolled back LockTimeoutException - if pessimistic locking fails and only the statement is rolled back PersistenceException - if the query execution exceeds the query timeout value set and the transaction is rolled back

        Parameters:
        employeeId - Existed Employee.ID to set Phone to.

        Returns:
